name: Poison Resistance
summary: Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.
description:
Your body has become fortified against toxins. You gain poison resistance equal to half your level, and you gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against poisons.Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.
